description: The iPhone 17, launched at Rs. 82,900, looks to be the most value-for-money iPhone to buy this year. With meaningful upgrades such as a ProMotion display, better battery life, and improved camera sensors, Apple has made it a much better deal overall. This year, Apple has poured so many upgrades into its standard model that I'll recommend it to most people, not just first-time iPhone buyers or those on a budget.
title: iPhone 17 Review: Forget the Pro, This Is the iPhone to Get

description: Accused is a Tamil drama movie that is now streaming on Aha Tamil. The movie stars Udhaya in the lead role and keeps the viewers engaged throughout.
title: Accused Now Streaming On OTT: Know Where to Watch This Tamil Drama Movie Online

description: MIT physicists have developed a molecular technique using radium monofluoride that lets electrons probe inside atomic nuclei, replacing particle accelerators and offering new insight into matter–antimatter asymmetry.
title: MIT Physicists Discover a Way to See Inside Atoms Using Tabletop Molecular Technique

description: Researchers at The Ohio State University have turned mushrooms into organic memory devices that mimic brain-like computing. The fungal circuits, powered by shiitake and button mushrooms, can switch between electrical states thousands of times per second, offering a biodegradable, low-cost alternative to conventional microchips.
title: Mushrooms Could Power Future Eco-Friendly Computers, Study Suggests

description: AI-powered models are transforming storm surge forecasting by generating accurate coastal flood predictions in minutes. Using past storm data and neural networks, these systems outperform traditional physics models, helping coastal communities prepare faster as climate change drives stronger hurricanes and higher seas.
title: Researchers Use AI to Predict Storm Surges Faster and More Accurately

description: Laboratory experiments reveal that radiation striking Saturn’s icy moon Enceladus can create simple organic molecules, reshaping how scientists interpret Cassini’s data and highlighting radiation’s key role in the chemistry of icy moons.
title: Saturn’s Icy Moon Enceladus Organic Molecules May Have Been Fromed by Cosmic Rays, Scientists Find

description: OpenAI is reportedly preparing to introduce targeted ads within ChatGPT. According to The Information, some senior leaders, many of them former Meta employees, see ads as a major revenue opportunity, even suggesting personalisation using the chatbot’s memory data. CEO Sam Altman, once sceptical, now calls ads “somewhat distasteful but not a nonstarter,” signalling a clear softening of his stance.
title: Google Introduces Vibe Coding to Its AI Studio, Lets Users Create AI Apps With Text Prompts

description: According to a new leak, the iPhone 18 Pro series will feature a refined design, variable aperture support, and a 48-megapixel periscope telephoto camera with a larger aperture. Apple reportedly plans to launch the iPhone 18 Pro, Pro Max, Air, and Fold models in September 2026, followed by the standard iPhone 18 and 18e in early 2027. The Pro models may retain the triple rear camera setup, add a semi-transparent back, and include a stainless-steel vapour chamber cooling system.
title: iPhone 18 Pro Max Key Features Leaked; iPhone 18 Series May Launch in Phases

description: Japan has launched its first yen-pegged stablecoin, JPYC, developed by Tokyo-based fintech JPYC Inc. Fully backed by yen reserves and government bonds, the stablecoin aims to modernise digital payments and settlements. The launch marks Japan’s entry into the global stablecoin race, long dominated by dollar-backed assets such as USDT and USDC, and could pave the way for faster, low-cost financial transactions.
title: Japan Enters Stablecoin Race With Launch of Yen-Pegged JPYC

description: In a landmark ruling, the Madras High Court has recognised cryptocurrency as property under Indian law. The judgment provides legal clarity for investors and businesses, affirming that digital assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum can be owned and transferred. While experts call it a milestone for India’s crypto ecosystem, concerns remain over the absence of a comprehensive regulatory framework and how future court decisions might shape its long-term implications.
title: Madras High Court Recognises Crypto as Property: What This Means for Indian Investors

description: Microsoft is facing a lawsuit in Australia after the ACCC accused it of misleading Microsoft 365 subscribers. The regulator claims Microsoft failed to mention that users could keep their old plan at the same price without Copilot AI features. Instead, subscribers were told to pay higher prices or cancel. The case could result in fines of up to AUD 50 million per breach.
title: Microsoft Faces Lawsuit in Australia Over Allegedly Misleading Users on Copilot Pricing

description: Motorola teased the launch of a new smartphone in India through social media channels on Monday. The teaser showcases the phone's rear design. The moniker of the upcoming device is not revealed, but it is speculated to be the Moto X70 Air, which is already available in China. It is powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset and carries a 4,800mAh battery.
title: Moto X70 Air India Launch Seemingly Teased: Here Are Some Confirmed Specifications, Price Range

description: OnePlus 15, the successor to last year's OnePlus 13, was launched in China on Monday (October 27). The Chinese smartphone maker will sell the handset in three colourways. The flagship phone is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It packs a 7,300mAh battery with 120W Super Flash Charge wired charging and 50W Wireless Flash Charge support. It also features a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit. It will be available in China via the company's online store.
title: OnePlus 15 Launched With 7,300mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus Ace 6 has been launched in China alongside the OnePlus 15. It arrives as the OnePlus Ace 5 successor, and could be marketed as the OnePlus 15R in India and the global markets. The handset is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, coupled with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. It packs a 7,800mAh battery and supports wired fast charging at 120W.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 With 165Hz Display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung is widely expected to launch its first trifold smartphone at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in South Korea later this week. Samsung reportedly intends to sell the device in select markets. Likely to be named Galaxy Z TriFold, the much-awaited handset is expected to run on a Snapdragon chipset. It could feature a 9.96-inch display when fully unfolded.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Launch Timeline Leaked Again; Said to Be Available in a Few Asian Countries

description: The upcoming Vivo S50 series, expected to launch in China this November, has reportedly leaked online. The lineup, comprising the S50 and S50 Pro Mini, may feature a periscope telephoto lens with a flagship-grade sensor and 1.5K AMOLED displays up to 120Hz. Both phones are tipped to include ultrasonic fingerprint sensors and run on flagship-level chipsets.
title: Vivo S50 Series Tipped to Feature a Periscope Telephoto Lens, 50-Megapixel Selfie Camera

description: Vivo is expected to launch the X300 and X300 Pro in India in the first week of December, featuring support for the new Zeiss Telephoto Extender Kit and 2.35x teleconverter lenses, offering up to 8.8x optical zoom. Both phones run on the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip with Android 16-based OriginOS 6. The Vivo X300 series models sport a Zeiss-tuned triple camera setup with V3+ and Vs1 imaging chips. They support 90W wired and 40W wireless charging.
title: Vivo X300 Series Tipped to Launch in India With Zeiss Telephoto Extender Kits

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra could be equipped with a 200-megapixel periscope camera, paired with a 50-megapixel primary shooter on the back, a tipster has revealed via a social media post. These camera specifications align with past reports, which also suggested that it will sport 200-megapixel and 50-megapixel cameras. Moreover, the Xiaomi 17 Ultra will reportedly be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. The handset is could succeed the Xiaomi 15 Ultra.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Could Feature a 200-Megapixel Periscope, 50-Megapixel Main Cameras: See Expected Specifications

description: Battlefield 6's Season 1 launches October 28. A new leak claims that EA will also shadow drop the game's free-to-play Battle Royale mode on the same date. The mode is reportedly called 'Battlefield: RedSec'. According to the leaked information, the mode will support two-player and four-player teams.
title: Battlefield 6's Battle Royale Mode Is Reportedly Called 'RedSec', Will Launch on October 28

description: Kantara: Chapter 1, written and directed by Rishab Shetty, is a Kannada Period drama movie that is set to release on Amazon Prime Video. Overall, it has been a super hit at the box office.
title: Kantara: Chapter 1 OTT Release Date Confirmed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: OnePlus is gearing up to launch a new smartphone alongside the OnePlus 15 and the OnePlus Ace 6. According to a report, the handset could debut as the OnePlus Turbo. It may be powered by the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. The report suggests that the handset could get a 6.7-inch 165Hz screen, X-axis linear motor, and an 8,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging support.
title: OnePlus Turbo Reportedly in Development With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chip and 8,000mAh Battery; India Launch Tipped

description: Bharat Taxi, India’s first cooperative cab service by the Ministry of Cooperation and NeGD, offers a driver-owned, commission-free alternative to Ola and Uber. Drivers, called Saarthis, keep full earnings and share governance through the Sahakar Taxi Cooperative led by Amul’s Jayen Mehta. Integrated with DigiLocker and UMANG for transparency, it starts a 650-cab pilot in Delhi in November 2025, expanding to 20 cities by December. Backed by cooperatives like Amul, IFFCO, NABARD, and NCDC, it is claimed to ensure fair fares and reliability.
title: Bharat Taxi Launch: Things You Should Know About Govt-Backed Uber and Ola Rival

description: Mecturing has unveiled its latest robot vacuum cleaner, MopX2, in India. The new vacuum and cleaning solution comes with AI-driven features and includes dual rotating mops with a 20N scrubbing force. The MecTuring Mop X2 offers 15,000 Pa suction and has an auto-emptying system.
title: Mecturing Mop X2 With 15,000Pa Suction Power Launched in India

description: OpenAI is reportedly preparing to introduce targeted ads within ChatGPT. According to The Information, some senior leaders — many of them former Meta employees — see ads as a major revenue opportunity, even suggesting personalisation using the chatbot’s memory data. CEO Sam Altman, once sceptical, now calls ads “somewhat distasteful but not a nonstarter,” signalling a clear softening of his stance.
title: OpenAI Could Show Ads on ChatGPT Based on What It Knows About You: Report

description: Apple presently allows software developers to advertise their apps in the search section of the App Store. Now, the company is reportedly planning to integrate ads in its native Maps app, too. The move might get implemented by next year. Apple might allow restaurants and other businesses to pay in exchange for getting featured on the Apple Maps' search section. The tech giant could label these promoted results as sponsored, while also using AI tools to show revelant ads to users.
title: Apple Plans to Show More Ads in Maps App by Next Year: Report

description: Bitcoin climbed above $115,500 (roughly ₹1.01 crore) on Monday, supported by optimism over improving US-China trade ties and expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut. Ethereum and other major altcoins also recorded notable gains as inflation data came in softer than expected. Analysts remain cautiously optimistic about further upside as policy clarity improves.
title: Bitcoin Extends Rally Above $115,500 as Market Optimism Builds Ahead of Fed Rate Decision

description: A recent report reveals references to Google’s upcoming “bubble apps” feature in the latest Android Canary 2510 release. The update will allow users to drag an app’s icon from a tablet’s bottom corner to open it in a floating window, complete with a tutorial and animation. Expanding beyond chat bubbles, this system could make multitasking smoother and more flexible on large screens. The feature may debut with Android 16’s first Quarterly Platform Release in 2026 or Android 17.
title: Google Testing New App Bubbling Feature to Improve Multitasking on Android Tablets: Report

description: Lava Shark was launched in India on Monday. The smartphone is an entry-level offering, and it comes with a  Unisoc T7250 SoC. It has an AI-backed 50-megapixel rear camera unit and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter. The handset runs on Android 15 out of the box and is backed by a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Lava Shark 2 4G Launched in India With 5,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite, which was earlier tipped to launch in early November, is now confirmed to debut globally on October 29. The handset was recently listed on the Geekbench benchmarking platform with the A001T model number. The handset is widely expected to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset, coupled with a Mali-G615 MC2 GPU. It might be offered in at least an 8GB RAM variant and ship with Android 15.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Launch Date Confirmed: See Expected Specifications, Price

description: Apple announced its new 14-inch MacBook Pro earlier this month latest M5 chip. The new model has a 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display and is claimed to deliver up to 24 hours of battery life on a single charge. While the processor is new, what's actually different about the latest MacBook Pro from the MacBook Air (M4)? Here's a quick comparison between the two models.
title: Apple MacBook Pro M5 vs MacBook Air M4: Which Is a Better Everyday Laptop for You?

description: Instagram is rolling out a highly-requested feature, which enables users to find and revisit the Reels they have watched previously. It is expected to work similarly to the Watch History feature on YouTube. As per an Instagram official, they will be able to filter out Reels based on a specific date or date range, and even search for Reels shared by a particular account on the social media platform.
title: Instagram Announces Watch History Feature for Revisiting Already-Watched Reels

description: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas reignited his rivalry with Google, saying the “Internet is too important to be left in Google’s hands.” The remark followed a poll where Chrome narrowly beat Perplexity’s Comet browser. Srinivas admitted Comet still needs work but doubled down on his stance against Google’s dominance, echoing antitrust concerns over the company’s control of the web.
title: Internet Is Too Important to Be Left in Google’s Hands, Says Perplexity CEO

description: Microsoft revealed Halo: Campaign Evolved, an Unreal Engine 5 remake of Halo: Combat Evolved, on Friday. The remake will launch on PC, Xbox Series S/X, and PS5 in 2026. This marks the first time a Halo game will launch on PlayStation. Halo: Campaign Evolved will feature overhauled visuals, new story missions, co-op support, and will be available day one on Xbox Game Pass.
title: Microsoft Announces Halo: Combat Evolved Remake for 2026, Confirms Halo Games Are Coming to PS5

description: OnePlus 15's launch in China is a few hours away. Leading up to its much-anticipated debut, the Chinese smartphone maker has been revealing various specifications and features of its upcoming flagship handset. Now, the company has listed 10 new upgrades that the phone will offer over last year's OnePlus 13. It is claimed to launch with multiple IP ratings for dust and water resistance. It will also feature a new gaming chip.
title: OnePlus 15 New Gaming Core Chip, Other Specifications Revealed Hours Before Launch

description: OpenAI is reportedly developing an AI music generation tool capable of producing instrumental tracks from both text and audio prompts. According to The Information, it may also add music to Sora videos or enhance vocal tracks with instruments. The company is said to be working with Juilliard students on training data, marking its entry into a space led by Suno, Udio, and Beatoven.ai.
title: OpenAI Said to Be Working on an AI Text-to-Music Generator to Rival Suno

description: Oppo launched the Find X9 and X9 Pro in China with Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chips, while the Find X9 Ultra is expected later this year. Tipsters suggest it may feature a 6.8-inch 2K display, an improved quad-camera setup with dual periscope lenses, and a large battery between 7,000mAh and 8,000mAh, which could possibly be the biggest among Ultra models. Oppo is also reportedly developing an ultra-thin smartphone, potentially part of the Find or Reno series, alongside Xiaomi’s rumoured 17 Air.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra Tipped to Pack Largest Battery Among 'Ultra' Models; Oppo May Be Working on Ultra-Thin Phone

description: Apple's contract manufacturer, Foxconn, is reportedly planning to double production capacity at its Hyderabad facility in India, where AirPods are manufactured. This comes months after a report revealed that the manufacturing plant is witnessing a rare-earth metals shortage, which is important for assembling the device. On top of this, the move could be part of the Cupertino tech giant's larger strategy to reduce its dependence on China.
title: Apple Planning to Double Monthly AirPods Production Capacity in India After iPhone: Report

description: Apple is reportedly developing a vapour chamber cooling system for the next-generation iPad Pro, expected around spring 2027. According to analyst Mark Gurman’s Power On newsletter, the feature will improve heat dissipation, allowing the device to stay thin and maintain strong performance during heavy use. The new iPad Pro will likely feature Apple’s 2nm M6 chip, debuting in Macs next year. Apple first introduced vapour chamber cooling in the iPhone 17 Pro series, which effectively reduced overheating, especially during gaming.
title: Apple to Equip Next-Gen iPad Pro with Vapour Chamber Cooling and M6 Chip: Mark Gurman

description: iQOO 15 will be launched in India soon, a company official has teased. The handset has already made its debut in China and is expected to arrive as the successor to the iQOO 13 in the country. Alongside, the company also teased the new design language of OriginOS 6, featuring Dynamic Glow that brings a light glow, smooth effects, and a new feel to the user interface (UI).
title: iQOO 15 Teased to Launch in India in November; to Come With Dynamic Glow UI Design

description: After Perplexity AI CEO Aravind Srinivas remarked that “maps are the hardest,” Mappls MapmyIndia has expressed interest in partnering with Perplexity AI. The company highlighted its extensive experience in mapping India and extended an open invitation for collaboration.  MapmyIndia also referenced its association with Zoho. The company claims that over 35 million users currently trust its apps in India and are now expanding globally.
title: Mappls' MapmyIndia Eyes Collaboration With Perplexity AI After CEO’s Comment on Mapping Challenges

description: OnePlus 15 is scheduled to go official in China later today (October 27) alongside the OnePlus Ace 6. Mere hours ahead of launch, the pricing of the upcoming OnePlus handsets has been leaked, according to a report. The flagship model is expected to be offered in four RAM and storage variants, with the top-end configuration coming with 16GB of RAM and 1TB of onboard storage. Meanwhile, the OnePlus Ace 6 will reportedly be sold with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of onboard storage.
title: OnePlus 15, OnePlus Ace 6 Price Reportedly Leaked Hours Ahead of Launch in China
